text: Seems to be some wonky-ness in the themes variables for headline sizes

Seems to be wonky variable settings..

See line 71 (on left) vs line 86 (on left).

the corresponding results line 59 (on right), and 74 (on left)

Also: How and where is the google web fonts being loaded when themes are used? seems on non-chrome browsers the boilerplate doesn't load google web fonts that aren't open sans (because it's defined in the main.css manually)
